td.content: s:pt presents with 2 weeks history of moderate weight loss, moderate 3 cm polyp on first screening colonoscopy and moderate feeling of increasing tiredness. he is a M retired aged 70 Ys. Patient does not smoke describes drinking an average of 12 drinks a week for about 2 years in his past o:Height 162 cm, Weight 84.2 kg, Temperature 37.1 C, Pulse 80, SystolicBP 109, DiastolicBP 71, Respiration 16 a:Colon Cancer p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and referred patient to oncology.

td.content: s:white male retired aged 70 ys presents with moderate 3 cm polyp on first screening colonoscopy, moderate weight loss x 5 weeks. pt also reports chronic moderate feeling of increasing tiredness. describes drinking an average of 12 beers a week for about 2 years in his past denies any smoking o:Height 163 cm, Weight 85.6 kg, Temperature 37.1 C, Pulse 80, SystolicBP 112, DiastolicBP 75, Respiration 17 a:Colon Cancer p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed 5-FU - 425 mg/m2 IV, Leucovorin - 20 mg/m2 IV, and ordered left hemicolectomy - colon.
